archives-sub: Archive the saves you’re finished with using the <1></1> icon.
archives-title: Keep your Pocket fresh and clean
articles-sub: Go to Discover to see our latest article recommendations.
articles-title: Here’s where you’ll see the articles you’ve saved.
favorites-sub: Hit the <1></1> icon to favorite an article and find it faster.
highlights-sub: Select a line in an article, then hit ‘highlight’ to save it for later.
search-sub: You don’t have any saves that match this search inquiry.
tags-sub: Tag your saves by topic to quickly find them later.
videos-title: Videos you’ve saved will show up here
